You will take your mobile base across different alien planets, each with its own unique enemies to conquer. With 20+ weapons and 100+ items, you can freely combine builds and create your own style

4271720.title: What's in the box?
4271720.short_description: A first-person incremental game where you buy and open containers filled with random items, repair and upgrade the things you find, and sell them for profit. In a dark industrial environment, upgrade your character, tools, and machines, earn money, and step by step work your way toward freedom.

4271920.title: How Smart Are You? IQ Test
4271920.short_description: How smart are you? Take this IQ test and find out!

4272350.title: A Game About Having A Job
4272350.short_description: The money management simulation where you work, trade, bank, and gamble in a procedurally generated world. Browse the job market, gain skills through employment, buy stocks, trade options, place risky bets, and hit it big in a world that's different every time you play.

4272360.title: Trapped on the FlipSide
4272360.short_description: In this Puzzle Platformer, follow the narrative of three explorers, kidnapped by a mechanical megastructure. Play as their assistant spherical robot in an effort to save them from this brutal place. By powering up the system, area by area, the secretive past and dark truth may make itself known.

4272720.title: Pickupbal
4272720.short_description: A simple game all about picking up a ball.

4272960.title: MOVING WITH THE MOON: Mastering Universal Gravitation!
4272960.short_description: This is a new action game where you steer the earth. Steer the Earth, when both the Earth and the Moon are in the goal zone, the stage is cleared. Stars are constantly pulling on each other with universal gravitation. You can experience a simulated universal gravitation.

4272970.title: LOST INSIDE
4272970.short_description: LOST INSIDE is a story-driven, non-traditional RPG about a little human child who stumbles their way into the Spirit World. They soon find out that the world has been corrupted by a curse, and only they can save the world for good by finding the 3 energy stones.

4273050.title: MITNAL
4273050.short_description: Play as Emily, drawn to a remote Mayan ruin after her brother insists itâ€™s safe, amazing and beautiful. Explore an ancient Mayan site spanning jungle, temple, and catacombs as it becomes clear that he didnâ€™t understand what he uncovered.

4273100.title: KunKunPrison
4273100.short_description: This is a fictional story. In the game, you need to gather clues and uncover the secrets of this prison and leave safely. All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.

4273150.title: Galaxy Defender Elite 3D
4273150.short_description: Defend the galaxy as you fight swarms of alien invaders.

4273370.title: Peak or Die
4273370.short_description: Peak or Die is a narrative-driven survival game about leading a team of adventurers up a deadly mountain, where every decision has lasting consequences. Manage oxygen, food, and team morale while facing moral dilemmas, random events, and an unforgiving environment. Reach the summit â€” or fail trying.

4274370.title: Floral Fury Online
4274370.genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG
4274370.short_description: Unleash nature's wrath in Floral Fury Online, an Indie Action MMORPG. Master a unique Fusion system, conquer procedural dungeons, and battle epic bosses with dynamic combat. Forge your legacy, join guilds, and dominate the economy in a world where weather dictates the tide of battle.

4274860.title: As Duty Demands
4274860.short_description: As Duty Demands is a first-person psychological horror set in a decaying naval retirement home. Step into the shoes of Coral, a newly hired nurse navigating a shifting reality where the forgotten veterans' war traumas manifest as harrowing nightmares. Uncover the Admiralâ€™s secrets and survive.

4275130.title: My Tiny Grocery Store - Desktop Idle Supermarket Game
4275130.short_description: My Tiny Grocery Store is an idle shopping simulator located in the bottom right corner of your screen that allows you to manage your store while also completing other tasks!Â Design your store, arrange your shelves, and enjoy earning money.
